statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, sender FROM communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT sender, receiver FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, sender, receiver FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Charlie' AND receiver = 'David' AND message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT error_message, severity FROM error_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT CONCAT(sender, ' sent a message to ', receiver) AS action FROM communication_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT id, sender, receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sender DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender, receiver FROM communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' AND timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT receiver, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM communication_logs GROUP BY receiver HAVING message_count > 5 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Bob' AND receiver = 'Alice' AND timestamp < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, username FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email NOT LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT log_id, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE device_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT message, sender, receiver FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM Errors INNER JOIN CommunicationLogs ON CommunicationLogs.log_id = Errors.log_id
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message FROM error_logs WHERE source='Database';
SELECT * FROM connection_logs WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1';
SELECT analyzer, result FROM analysis_logs ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice' OR receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM connection_logs ORDER BY connection_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT type, message FROM status_logs ORDER BY status_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT analyzer, result FROM analysis_logs WHERE analyzer LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 5;
